mapper.select: SELECT up.* FROM ums_admin_role_relation uarr LEFT JOIN ums_role ur ON uarr.role_id = ur.id LEFT JOIN ums_role_permission_relation urpr ON urpr.role_id = ur.id LEFT JOIN ums_permission up ON urpr.permission_id = up.id WHERE uarr.admin_id = #{adminId} AND up.id IS NOT NULL AND up.id NOT IN ( SELECT up2.id FROM ums_admin_permission_relation uapr2 LEFT JOIN ums_permission up2 ON uapr2.permission_id = up2.id WHERE uapr2.type = -1 AND uapr2.admin_id = #{adminId} ) UNION SELECT up.* FROM ums_admin_permission_relation uapr LEFT JOIN ums_permission up ON uapr.permission_id = up.id WHERE uapr.type = 1 AND uapr.admin_id = #{adminId}
